original: @70b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @70b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: The practitioner who is endowed with the commitments and accomplishes the perfect activity

original: mchod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnam par rol par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnam par rol par bya'o //
translated: should play in the great ocean of offerings.

original: dbus su 'bru sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag go ;
analyzed: dbus su 'bru sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag go ;
translated: In the center, place a bali of various grains.

original: / shar phyogs su kham sa'i glud sor bzhi pa brgya la gdugs brgya /
analyzed: / shar phyogs su kham sa'i glud sor bzhi pa brgya la gdugs brgya /
translated: In the east, place one hundred four-finger-widths of clay effigies with one hundred parasols.

original: lhor ba dan brgya /🔽nub tu rgyal mtshan brgya /
analyzed: lhor ba dan brgya / nub tu rgyal mtshan brgya /
translated: In the south, one hundred banners.🔽In the west, one hundred victory banners.
In the north, one hundred silk streamers.

original: de dag lan bdun bdun byas na 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par nges so //
analyzed: de dag lan bdun bdun byas na 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par nges so //
translated: If one does this seven times each, one will certainly attain perfect prosperity.

original: phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa las tshogs stong rgyas zhes bya ba /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa las tshogs stong rgyas zhes bya ba /
translated: The collection of activities called The Thousand Expansions is complete.

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
